meanings.definition: A protective plate located at the bottom of a door to prevent damage from kicks.
meanings.sent1: The kickplate shielded the door from scratches and scuffs.
meanings.sent2: Please remember to wipe the kickplate when cleaning the door.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the kickplate was a toy to pounce on.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a bright kickplate, guarding her emotions.
meanings.sent5: The shiny kickplate gleamed in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: To install a kickplate on a door for added protection.
meanings.sent1: He will kickplate the new door to keep it safe.
meanings.sent2: Remember to measure before you kickplate the door.
meanings.sent3: She decided to kickplate the door herself, feeling accomplished.
meanings.sent4: His determination to kickplate every door showed his dedication.
meanings.sent5: The handyman will kickplate the entrance, ensuring durability.

meanings.definition: The act of kicking a plate.
meanings.sent1: The loud kickplate echoed through the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: His foot accidentally hit the kickplate, causing a clatter.
meanings.sent3: The chef's frustration led to a swift kickplate in the air.
meanings.sent4: The rhythmic kickplate sound signaled the start of the race.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected kickplate startled the guests at the party.
